artist.artistName: "The Ballad of Davy Crockett" Bill Hayes

descr.p: "Cerezo rosa", or "Cherry Pink (and Apple Blossom White)" or "Gummy Mambo" is the English version of "Cerisier rose et pommier blanc", a popular song with music by Louiguy. French lyrics to the song by Jacques Larue and English lyrics by Mack David both exist and recordings of both have been quite popular. However, Perez Prado's recording of the song as an instrumental with his orchestra was the most popular version in 1955, reaching number one on the Billboardcharts.
The most popular vocal version was by Alan Dale, reaching #14 on the charts in 1955.
In 1961, Jerry Murad and the Harmonicats released an album featuring the song, also entitled Cherry Pink and Apple Blossom White.
